title: Best Easy Italian Pasta Salad
directions: Cook pasta according to package directions. Allow to cool slightly (and maybe toss with a little oil to prevent sticking).
Toss all ingredients together! TOLD YOU IT WAS SO EASY.
Keep in the fridge for 2-3 days. I think it actually tastes best the day AFTER you make it.
ingredients: 1 lb. pasta such as fusilli, penne, or rotini (we use DeLallo whole wheat pasta! so yum.)
8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese balls, cut in half
1 lb. summer sausage or salami, cut into chunks
3 cups cherry tomatoes, cut in half
sliced red onion, crumbled feta cheese, pepperoncini (optional)
